import React from 'react' import './css/heroCard.css' import gLogo from './img/GOOGL.png' import fb from './img/FB.png' import am from './img/AMZN.svg' function Herocard() { const data = [ { title:"googl", logo:gLogo, val:"1515" }, { title:"fb", logo:fb, val:"1515" }, { title:"amzn", logo:am, val:"1515" } ] return (
{ data.map((rec) => { return(
{rec.title}

{rec.val}

) }) } {/*
GOOgL

1515 USD

fb

1515 USD

amzn

1515 USD

*/}
) } export default Herocard
